name: PolarCast
0: ”Alexa, ask Polar Cast, for how long am I going to see the sun today.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: polar cast
Developer Terms of Use
des: Guess how much of daylight you will have today? Know the answer? Alexa does. Just say: Alexa, ask Polar Cast how long we are going to have daylight for.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
